name: Amtec
overview: Amtec, LLC provides outsourced solutions to communication providers in North America. It offers construction services, such as aerial construction, underground construction, system audits/As builts, splicing and activation, MDU/design post-wiring and pre-wiring, and CLI leakage detection and correction, as well as fiber placement, activation, and testing services. The company also provides fulfillment services, including residential digital and analog installations, high speed data installations, high definition installations, commercial Internet services, VOIP deployment, audit services, and home theatre activation services. In addition, it offers engineering and design services, such as walk-off, strand-mapping and design, noise mitigation testing and correction, and sweep and certify plant services. Further, the company provides homeland security services, including perimeter monitoring and infrastructure, data transmission, and security system integration, as well as engineering, construction, and installing fiber optic security systems. Furthermore, it offers emergency response services, such as in advance storm warnings and post storm mobilization services. The company serves cable television, telecommunications, and broadband services industries. Amtec, LLC was formerly known as Amtech, LLC and changed its name in 2003. The company was founded in 1972 and is based in Boca Raton, Florida.

funding_rounds.source_description: Palm Beach Capital Announces $5 Million Investment in Amtec.
